feed.title: LEAP: Little Electronic and Arduino Projects
feed.subtitle: my collection of electronics projects, many involving an Arduino in one way or another

entry.title: #445 VariableDutyCycle/ControlAdjust
entry.summary: using the control pin to adjust duty cycle of a 555 Timer astable oscillator

entry.title: #444 VariableDutyCycle/DiodeSteering
entry.summary: using diode steering to achieve adjustable duty cycle at fixed frequency in a 555 Timer astable oscillator

entry.title: #443 BluePill 16x2 LCD
entry.summary: using a 16x2 LCD with an ARM Cortex-M3 STM32F103C8T6 Blue Pill board and programmed the Arduino IDE

entry.title: #442 BoldportClub/respot
entry.summary: Boldport puts the "pot" back in the resistance, a classic decade resistor box in custom pots

entry.title: #441 Pollen8
entry.summary: a freeform wire sculpture with LEDs driven by a light-sensitive 555/4017 counter circuit

entry.title: #440 DataLogging/VoltageToAdafruitIO
entry.summary: using Adafruit IO and an Ethernet shield to collect analog measurements to the cloud with MQTT

entry.title: #439 QX5252SolarNightLight
entry.summary: exploring the circuit inside most garden solar lights, which uses a QX5252/YX805 boost and charge controller

entry.title: #438 RFID/DeviceDumper
entry.summary: getting started with some RFID research and using an RC522 RFID reader with MIFARE Classic cards and tags

entry.title: #437 QX5252JouleThief
entry.summary: using a QX5252/YX805 LED driver chip as a joule thief for driving an LED from a low-voltage battery

entry.title: #436 Vivian
entry.summary: a BEAM Vibrobot using a classic solar-powered FLED circuit enhanced with a QX5252/YX805 solar LED driver

entry.title: #435 BEAM
entry.summary: a quick survey of the BEAM (Biology, Electronics, Aesthetics and Mechanics) field

entry.title: #434 BoldportClub/krell
entry.summary: building the Boldport Krell: a handheld DSP synthesiser built around a Microchip dsPIC and a design from madlab

entry.title: #433 AdjustablePowerSupplyKit
entry.summary: building a popular 30V/3A adjustable power supply kit, making an enclosure and testing

entry.title: #432 StepperMotors/ULN2003Module
entry.summary: investigating the common ULN2003A modules provided for unipolar stepper motor control - this one is identified as X113647

entry.title: #431 StepperMotors/28BYJ48
entry.summary: all about the 28BYJ-48 unipolar stepper motor and driving it with an Arduino

entry.title: #430 BipolarWormDrive/SimpleHBridge
entry.summary: testing some linear/worm-drive stepper motors salvaged from a DVD drive unit, using a bespoke H-bridge circuit and Arduino .. or pushbuttons!

entry.title: #429 3x7/PomodoroTimer
entry.summary: a Pomodoro timer wire sculpture using the Boldport 3x7 display and an ATmega328

entry.title: #428 3x7 LRThreeDigitDemo
entry.summary: driving the Boldport 3x7 display from a Cuttle (Arduino) and the LRThreeDigits library

entry.title: #427 ATtiny/SoftwarePWM
entry.summary: generating arbitrary PWM signals with an ATtiny85 and bit-banging techniques

entry.title: #426 3x7 RippleTester
entry.summary: using some 4000 series counters (CD4017, CD4060) to exercise the digits and segments of the Boldport 3x7

entry.title: #425 BoldportClub/3x7
entry.summary: building the Boldport 3x7, Project #29, with custom flip-top layout so you can see inside this discrete 3-digit, 7-segment display

entry.title: #424 TheToneRanger
entry.summary: a simple modification of the basic VL53L0X example to add audio indication of range

entry.title: #423 MakerUno
entry.summary: checking out the Maker UNO, a feature-packed Arduino-compatible board from Cytron in Penang, Malaysia

entry.title: #422 LaserTapeMeasure
entry.summary: using a VL53L0X ranging sensor to make a short-range laser tape measure with an Arduino with Nokia 5110 display

entry.title: #421 LimeSDR/FirstLook
entry.summary: unboxing and first test of the LimeSDR-USB software-defined radio with MacOSX host

entry.title: #420 CuttleTalk
entry.summary: playing audio from a Boldport Cuttle (Arduino) over LiFi with lite2sound

entry.title: #419 BoldportClub/lite2sound-bc
entry.summary: building Lite2Sound Boldport Club Project #26

entry.title: #418 CommonEmitterHartley
entry.summary: build and test a BJT common-emitter Hartley oscillator

entry.title: #417 SimpleSamplePlayer
entry.summary: playing short audio samples on an Arduino using some PWM tricks from the PCM library

entry.title: #416 LineFollowerKit
entry.summary: building the D2-5 Intelligent Line Tracking Car Kit - a nice demonstration of a simple feedback control system with an LM358 op-amp

entry.title: #415 Nixie Power Supply - 555 Timer Version
entry.summary: using a 555 boost converter to test some Nixie IN3 and IN14 tubes

entry.title: #414 Decade Programmable Resistor
entry.summary: building an old-fashioned 7-digit decade programmable resistor with push-button control

entry.title: #413 Rotary Encoder Tester
entry.summary: demonstrating a rotary encoder forward/reverse LED indicator using simple digital logic

entry.title: #412 BJT Comparator
entry.summary: investigating and testing a comparator design with discrete components

entry.title: #411 BoldportClub/cordwood-three
entry.summary: custom build of the Boldport Club Cordwood Puzzle III, Project #25, May 2018, with an archway layout and a spring-loaded LED trigger machanism

entry.title: #410 HomopolarJouleThiefBlinky
entry.summary: a totally Rube-Goldberg contraption for blinking an LED with a AAA battery, homopolar motor and joule thief mechanisms

entry.title: #409 BoldportClub/conehead
entry.summary: the Conehead is the fourth in the Boldport Club series of beautiful electronic critters, Project #24 April 2018

entry.title: #408 BBBreakout
entry.summary: a little breadboard power adapter and breakout with 5.5x2.1mm barrel jack, terminal block and XH2.54 connectors

entry.title: #407 DPS3005BenchPowerSupply
entry.summary: building an AC-powered 32V/5A variable bench power supply based on the DPS3005 DC power supply module and rectified step-down transformer

entry.title: #406 SerialInterface/UsbUartCH340G
entry.summary: build a USB to TTL serial interface on a breadboard using the CH340G interface chip, and use it to program Arduino sketches on an ATmega328P

entry.title: #405 ATmegaSerialProgrammer
entry.summary: all about bootloaders and how to program an ATMEGA328P chip over a serial connection with a CH340G USB-Serial adapter instead of ICSP

entry.title: #404 Arza-matron
entry.summary: whipping together a simple sound-activated party decoration with the other half of the Fretboard guitar some LED strips

entry.title: #403 GY560
entry.summary: checking out the GY560 Frequency Counter

entry.title: #402 BoldportClub/pips
entry.summary: rolling the BoldportClub Pips (Project #23) - a classic Elektor die circuit using the CD4060 ripple counter

entry.title: #401 Pixie
entry.summary: research the history and variants of the Pixie QRP transceiver, and build a basic Pixie 4.3 kit on 40m

entry.title: #400 USBProtector
entry.summary: building the Silicon Chip USB Protector which demonstrates various methods of reverse-polarity, over-voltage and over-current protection

entry.title: #399 AT89C2051/LedChaser
entry.summary: run an LED chaser with an AT89C2051 using interrupts for timing; C source compiled with SDCC on MacOSX

entry.title: #398 LCD I2C Adapter
entry.summary: using an I²C adapter to reduce the Arduino pins needed to drive an LCD

entry.title: #397 I2CScanner
entry.summary: scanning for I²C devices with an Arduino

entry.title: #396 CapacitiveTouchOrgan
entry.summary: a simple chromatic scale organ, controlled with a Freescale/NXP MPR121 Proximity Capacitive Touch Sensor and an Arduino

entry.title: #395 AT89C2051/Blinky
entry.summary: Simplest LED blinky program in C for the AT89C2051(8051/MCS51) microprocessor, built with the SDCC open-source toolchain on MacOSX

entry.title: #394 AT89C2051/Programmer
entry.summary: building a programmer for the Intel MCS-51/8051 compatible AT89C2051, with host software running on MacOSX

entry.title: #393 DicksonChargePump
entry.summary: Zener-regulated 12V Dickson Charge Pump driven with Arduino PWM

entry.title: #392 BoldportClub/whiteboard
entry.summary: building the Whiteboard (Boldport Club project #22), a breadboard enhancer featuring variable and coin-cell power supplies and prototyping areas. Demonstrated with a 4-stage CD4060 ripple counter

entry.title: #391 MilliVoltmeterDIY PCB and Enclosure
entry.summary: custom PCB and enclosure for the ATmega328-based millivolt meter based on a design by Scullcom Hobby Electronics. Uses an LTC2400 ADC and LT1019 voltage reference

entry.title: #390 PIC/GettingBlinky/UsingC
entry.summary: getting up and running building XC8 C projects on MacOSX and a PIC12F675. Let's get Blinky again!

entry.title: #389 TwoStageCommonEmitterAmplifier
entry.summary: designing a two-stage common-emitter BJT amplifier

entry.title: #388 SingaporeBands
entry.summary: notes on official band plans for Singapore and my and personal observations on where the activity is found

entry.title: #387 GpsBasics
entry.summary: using a NEMA-compatible GPS module for time and location with an Arduino

entry.title: #386 BluePill
entry.summary: programming an ARM Cortex-M3 STM32F103C8T6 Blue Pill board with the Arduino IDE

entry.title: #385 BoldportClub/widlar
entry.summary: hacking the BoldportClub Widlar (Project #21) to get the classic μA723 to do something other than voltage regulation (LED blinky)

entry.summary: playing with the basic high voltage output circuit for the LM723 voltage regulator
